other_tests.findings: Continuous focal slowing in the right hemisphere over the posterior regions, with no epileptic activity.
other_tests.changes_over_time: EEG showed mild, diffuse background slowing and superimposed intermittent posterior slowing, with right-sided predominance and no seizure activity.

other_tests.findings: Opening pressure was 11 cm of water.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Six months later, opening pressure was increased to 25 cm of water.

other_tests.findings: Colorless, clear turbidity, no organisms in cultures, normal lymphocytes, protein at 47 mg/dl, glucose at 73 mg/dl.
other_tests.changes_over_time: CSF analysis at 21 years 1 month showed colorless, clear turbidity, normal lymphocytes, protein at 32 mg/dl, glucose at 69 mg/dl.
